basic.description: Introduces students to the concept of health and health assessment across the life span. Learn theories and skills basic to developing therapeutic relationships, interviewing and physical assessment skills and techniques. Includes both classroom and experiential learning in the Clinical Education Centre. 2 hours lecture, 2 hours Clinical Education Centre  or Sim Lab per week; 9 units (3 credits) course weight.
basic.subject: NURS
basic.title: Health Assessment
